entry.content:
Pythonista in Training with PyBites PDM

This is my first post on my new blog!

I am 2 days into the 10 week PyBites Python Developer Mindset (PDM) program. I will be writing here to document my progress in the program as well as take notes on the many things I will be learning.

Until next time, Adam
